citations.narrative:
Structural strength. The last window on the side wall along row 4, has 3 rodent holes on the window sill and window
frame. Rodents and other pest can expose the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. Housing facilities for
guinea pigs must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to restrict other animals from entering. The window
sill and frame with holes must be repaired to prevent mice from entering the animal room. Correct by November 6, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.25(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Structural strength. The last window on the side wall along row 4, has 3 rodent holes on the window sill and window 
frame. Rodents and other pest can expose the guinea pigs to disease hazards and health problems. Housing facilities for 
guinea pigs must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to restrict other animals from entering. The window 
sill and frame with holes must be repaired to prevent mice from entering the animal room. Correct by November 6, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
